Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm new here and looking for some space station parts/modules to spice up my station building and fit the stock parts, I downloaded Kosmos, Fustek, B.A.C.E. and some other mods but I need more, and preferably fits the stock parts

KOSMOS = Great but doesn't fit the color of the stock parts (Maybe as a seperate station later)

Fustek = Great for an extension module

B.A.C.E. = too buggy, Hatches doesn't work and parts have gaps, don't fit

I have seen some cool looking parts but all their links are dead(I hear maybe because of the recent forum accident?)

I'm working on a part pack now that thanks to the forumers I've received a good amount of ideas pertaining to all kinds of parts, however I myself find the need for space station parts as currently you have far too many parts doing far too little which makes the whole thing laggy once you assemble 3 modules.

I've already completed a massive battery in the 2 meter diameter and 3 meter length which offers 10000 units of electrical charge, and once I finish modeling and texturing it, should be acceptable for use with stock parts (I personally like stock-a-like parts).

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25049-Bored-3D-Modeler-looking-for-a-challenge/page10

Suggest + read here, also doing the VASIMR engine which allows the slow movement and adjustment of space stations.
thanks, I am looking forward to it, but do you have any suggestion on any parts pack that I can use now that I may have missed?

thanks, I am looking forward to it, but do you have any suggestion on any parts pack that I can use now that I may have missed?

I wouldn't know of any other than the aforementioned ones, sorry.
